Richard Foreman and Kate Manheim Papers
Series IX: General Theater Related Material
Series IX: General Theater Related Material

Series IX includes programs, publicity and other materials from theater productions and performance pieces by other artists. Materials are arranged chronologically by year. Undated materials appear at the end of the series arranged chronologically by performer.
